name: Ignition Beast Launching
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Ignition Beast" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field, and up to 1 monster from your Deck as Fusion Material. You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 "Ignition Beast" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using monsters you control as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Ignition Beast Launching" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
